intro: Psychotria stellaris, commonly known as the star psychotria, is a species of flowering plant in the Rubiaceae family. It is native to the tropical regions of South America, particularly Brazil. The plant is characterized by its small, star-shaped white flowers that bloom in clusters. Its leaves are typically elliptical and have a glossy surface. Psychotria stellaris is often found in humid, shaded environments within tropical rainforests.
